mapper.insert: INSERT INTO test_result (record_id, patient_id, doctor_id, test_code, test_name, test_area, test_date, result_value, result_note, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES ( #{recordId}, #{patientId}, #{doctorId}, #{testCode}, #{testName}, #{testArea}, #{testDate}, #{resultValue}, #{resultNote}, #{status}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE test_result SET result_value = #{resultValue}, result_note = #{resultNote}, status = "COMPLETED", updated_at = now() WHERE test_result_id = #{testResultId}
mapper.select: SELECT tr.test_result_id, tr.record_id, tr.patient_id, p.name AS patientName, tr.doctor_id, d.doctor_name, tr.test_code, tr.test_name, tr.test_area, tr.test_date, tr.result_value, tr.result_note, tr.status, tr.created_at, tr.updated_at FROM test_result tr JOIN test_reservation r ON tr.patient_id = r.patient_id JOIN patient p ON tr.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN doctor d ON tr.doctor_id = d.doctor_id WHERE r.reservation_id = #{reservationId}
